# Copilot Instructions for Kenkai Labs Website

<!-- Use this file to provide workspace-specific custom instructions to Copilot. For more details, visit https://code.visualstudio.com/docs/copilot/copilot-customization#_use-a-githubcopilotinstructionsmd-file -->

## Project Overview
This is a modern web application for Kenkai Labs, a technology consulting company specializing in problem discovery, roadmap strategy, and software execution.

## Technology Stack
- Next.js 15 with App Router
- TypeScript
- Tailwind CSS
- React components
- Responsive design (mobile-first)

## Key Features
1. **Homepage**: Hero section, services overview, process explanation, lead capture
2. **Services Page**: Three main offerings (Discovery Sprint, Strategy, Execution)
3. **Booking System**: Multi-step booking flow with calendar integration
4. **Lead Magnets**: PDF downloads and email capture
5. **Responsive Design**: Mobile-first with micro-animations
6. **Trust Elements**: Social proof, team showcase, credibility builders

## Design Guidelines
- Clean, minimal aesthetic with trust-building whitespace
- Dark/light mode support
- Micro-animations for enhanced UX
- Persistent floating "Book a Call" button
- Professional color scheme suitable for B2B consulting

## Code Standards
- Use TypeScript for all components
- Follow Next.js App Router conventions
- Implement responsive design with Tailwind CSS
- Create reusable components for common elements
- Ensure accessibility and SEO optimization
